001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
005import java.util.List;
006
007/**
008 * Interface for validating tables in UI automation.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface defines a method for applying multiple assertions
011 * to a table object and returning validation results.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
014 */
015public interface UiTableValidator {
016
017   /**
018    * Validates a given table object against a set of assertions.
019    *
020    * <p>This method applies the specified assertions to the table and returns
021    * a list of validation results indicating whether the assertions passed or failed.
022    *
023    * @param object     The table object to be validated.
024    * @param assertions The assertions to apply.
025    * @param <T>        The type of the expected assertion results.
026    * @return A list of {@link AssertionResult} containing the validation outcomes.
027    */
028   <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validateTable(Object object, Assertion... assertions);
029}
